Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.AppointmentDAO
  • public class AppointmentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with accessing appointment information from the database. Queries the appointment table in the database and retrieves the results.

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
                                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all appointments from the database. Queries the appointments table in the database and retrieves all appointments.
        Returns:
        returns all appointments from the appointment table in the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateAppointment

        public static void updateAppointment​(int index,
                                     Appointment appointment)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates an appointment in the database.
        Parameters:
        index - the appointment id of the appointment being updated
        appointment - the new appointment after changes have been made
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • lookUpAppointment

        public static Appointment lookUpAppointment​(int appointmentId)
                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the appointment by id. Used in conjunction with the updateAppointment method to update an appointment.
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - the appointment id of the appointment that is to be updated
        Returns:
        returns the appointment that is going to be updated
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteAppointment

        public static void deleteAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes an appointment from the database. Queries the appointments table in the database and the appointment from it.
        Parameters:
        appointment - the appointment to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getFilteredAppointmentsMonth

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getFilteredAppointmentsMonth()
                                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Filters appointments by month. Queries the appointments table in the database and filters the results based on month.
        Returns:
        returns all the appointments in the requested month
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
